section.title: 通过 Docker 命令构建镜像
手工编译镜像
section.para: 在项目根目录创建 Dockerfile 文件
section.screen: % cat Dockerfile FROM openjdk VOLUME /tmp COPY target/*.jar app.jar ENTRYPOINT ["java","-Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/./urandom","-jar","/app.jar"]

mvn package docker build -t netkiller/docker .
% docker images | grep netkiller netkiller/docker latest ed359b6ffcad 16 seconds ago 105MB
% docker run -ti --entrypoint /bin/sh netkiller/docker sh-4.2# ls app.jar bin boot dev etc home lib lib64 media mnt opt proc root run sbin srv sys tmp usr var sh-4.2#

docker run -p 8080:8080 netkiller/docker
neo@MacBook-Pro ~ % curl http://localhost:8080 Hello Docker World

section.title: Dockerfile 放在 src/main/docker/Dockerfile 下
section.screen: % cat src/main/docker/Dockerfile FROM openjdk VOLUME /tmp COPY target/*.jar app.jar ENTRYPOINT ["java","-Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/./urandom","-jar","/app.jar"]
mvn package docker rmi netkiller/docker -f docker build -t netkiller/docker -f src/main/docker/Dockerfile . docker run -p 8080:8080 netkiller/docker
neo@MacBook-Pro ~ % curl http://localhost:8080 Hello Docker World

section.title: 通过参数指定 Springboot 文件
section.screen: % cat src/main/docker/Dockerfile FROM openjdk:8-jdk-alpine VOLUME /tmp ARG JAR_FILE COPY ${JAR_FILE} app.jar ENTRYPOINT ["java","-Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/./urandom","-jar","/app.jar"]
mvn package docker rmi netkiller/docker -f docker build --build-arg JAR_FILE=target/*.jar -t netkiller/docker -f src/main/docker/Dockerfile . docker run -p 8080:8080 netkiller/docker

section.title: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE 指定配置文件
section.screen: % docker run -e "SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE=prod" -p 8080:8080 netkiller/docker
